General.Name: Nutex Investments PLC
General.Description: NUTEX Investments Public Limited Company provides health conserving, health improving, dietary supplement, and cosmetic products in Hungary and internationally. The company was formerly known as HUMET Trade, Research and Development Public Limited Company and changed its name to NUTEX Investments Public Limited Company in February 2011. NUTEX Investments Public Limited Company is based in Budapest, Hungary.
